title: AH-64 Apache Helicopter: Sound System + Flight Model
description: The AH-64 Apache Sound System is an easily customizable flight model and about 70 dynamic sounds, including engine, rotors and weapon effects for cockpit, exterior and distant views with implemented replication. It's ideal for AAA multiplayer shooters.
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO

AH-64 Apache Sound System - Immersive Sound Symphony and Dynamic Flight Finesse for Unreal Engine.


  • Easily customizable helicopter flight model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, yaw and other helicopter's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this helicopter in real life
  • Different sounds for cockpit, exterior, and distant views
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication for movement and sounds
  • Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooter games


Over 35 high-quality helicopter engine sounds and about 30 weapon sounds, including the M230 chain gun, light and heavy rockets, complement the realistic battle atmosphere. And supported by replication for use in multiplayer projects.


With this plugin, you don't just hear the sounds of the helicopter — you experience them. Our advanced sound system realistically reproduces engine sounds, rotor sounds, tail rotor sounds, and cabin shake, reflecting every change in helicopter's parameters such as engine RPM, rotor RPM, helicopter speed, and much more.


In our relentless pursuit of audio excellence, we have spared no effort to provide the most authentic helicopter sound experience possible. We meticulously recorded our own audio samples and combined them with resources sourced from the internet to ensure that every aspect of the AH-64's sound profile is faithfully represented.
technicalDetails:
Code Module: AH64_SoundSystem (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


AH-64 APACHE HELICOPTER SOUND SYSTEM DEMONSTRATION: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE AND FLIGHT MODEL: VIDEO

  • Enable "AH64_SoundSystem " from Installed and "Windows RawInput" from Built-In plugins from "Edit > Plugins".
  • Set up the audio settings of your project as described in the 'How to Use' video.
  • Restart UE5.
  • Open "DemoLevel" from the plugin content folder.
  • FLY!!!


Check AH64_FlightModel_BP and AH64_SFX_Component_BP Actor Components in the AH64_Helicopter_BP to adjust Flight Model and Sound settings.


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.
